task_description:
# Remove Google Sign-in button - feature not supported

**Linear Issue:** [BUI-5](https://linear.app/builder-project/issue/BUI-5/remove-google-sign-in-button-feature-not-supported)
**Priority:** Urgent
**Status:** Backlog


## Description

**Bug Description:**
The login page shows a "Continue with Google" button but Google authentication is not implemented. The button currently just navigates to dashboard without actual authentication.

**Location:** frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx

**Expected Behavior:**
Either implement Google OAuth or remove the button entirely.

**Priority:** High
